name: Bubble Dimension
description:
In this world, two different creatures fight against each other in order to build a different civilization.

Purinos fight for all things bright while Fire Bubbles fight for chaos.

Help Purinos fix all structures damaged by Fire Bubbles. Make sure to eliminate them as well so they never come back.

Use your magic drill to make your way to the next building and damage enemies.

Collect tools to repair the damaged structures.

CONTROLS

A / D - Move

W / Space Bar - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

E - Interact

Esc / P - Pause

CREDITS
